Package actions

Class Forward

java.lang.Object
actions.Forward
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action
public class Forward extends Object implements Action
Attempt to move an adventurer forward to its orientation

  • Method Details

    • getTileForCoordinates

      private Optional<Tile> getTileForCoordinates(Position position, List<Tile> tiles, List<Adventurer> adventurers)
      Returns the tile at the given position
      Parameters:
      position - Position of the tile
      tiles - List of specific tiles
      adventurers - All the adventurers on the map
      Returns:
      The tile wrapped in an optional, if an adventurer is at the given position return an empty optional instead

    • isBlockedByAdventurer

      private boolean isBlockedByAdventurer(Position position, List<Adventurer> adventurers)
      Checks if an adventurer is at the given position on the map
      Parameters:
      position - Position where to check
      adventurers - All the adventurers on the map
      Returns:
      True if an adventurer is at the given position, false otherwise

    • process

      public void process(Adventurer adventurer, TreasureMap treasureMap, List<Adventurer> adventurers)
      Checks the boundaries before attempting to move
      Specified by:
      process in interface Action
      Parameters:
      adventurer - The adventurer that makes the action
      treasureMap - The map on which the action takes place
      adventurers - All the users on the map
